H0.text: Sherlock Holmes was proficient in which fictional martial art invented by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. **Holmestyle**

H1.text: Sherlock Holmes was proficient in which fictional martial art invented by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. **Londonjutsu**

H2.text: Sherlock Holmes was proficient in which fictional martial art invented by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. **Doyleido**

H3.text: Sherlock Holmes was proficient in which fictional martial art invented by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. Baritsu

A4.text: Baritsu is the name given to a form of martial art used to explain how Holmes had avoided falling into the Reichenbach Falls with Professor Moriarty.
